field.name: phone
field.description: A general format for international telephone numbers. @link https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164

field.name: age
field.description: The "age" is generally populated if "dob" is present by using the difference of "dob" and "occurred_at" to determine the age at the time of the submission.

field.name: networks
field.description: Networks is a map that contains handles/usernames on a social network. E.g. facebook:homer, twitter:stackoverflow, youtube:coltrane78.

field.name: mentions
field.description: Mentions contains the usernames extracted from the "networks" map and possibly parsed from other text fields. Makes it possible to search @mentions.

field.name: last_read_by_ref
field.description: A fully qualified reference to the user who last read this submission.

field.name: is_verified
field.description: If true this submission was verified to be from the associated ctx_user_ref or email. Verification can be secure cookie, email confirmation, phone verification, login, etc. If the submission was accepted without any kind of verification this should be false.

field.name: allcaps
field.description: The percentage (whole number) of text in the "story" that is ALL CAPS.

field.name: exclaims
field.description: The maximum number of contiguous exclamation points in the "story" text.

field.name: cf
field.description: Contains all of the answers submitted from the custom fields on the solicit.

field.name: s256
field.description: "s256" means shard 256. Used to distribute read/write from storage and speed up replay/reindex processes. It can also be used to distribute workload in front end user interfaces or notifications (like isles in a grocery store). This value should NOT change once set.

field.name: s32
field.description: "s32" means shard 32. See field "s256" for explanation.

field.name: s16
field.description: "s16" means shard 16. See field "s256" for explanation.
